title: News story
creator_credit: Gerard Bryant, Frank A. Hoare, Film Producers Guild and Merton Park
brief_description: How an issue of one of Britain’s major newspapers is produced, from the early morning, as a reporter interviews dockers about a strike, to well into the night when the freshly printed bundles are loaded on to the trains. At the Guardian’s London Office, all sections are seen making their particular contributions towards the daily miracle of another issue.
